name: Number Nightmare
description:
This game is a 360 stationary shooting game, in which you must use your positron guns to protect yourself from the attacking Number Nasties. Shoot the Number Nasty with the matching Magic Number from your positron gun to defeat them. The Nasties have you surrounded, so be prepared for attacks on all sides!

This game utilizes "one tool, many uses" by giving the positron gun a total of nine different shots, one for each Nasty that attacks. You will have to switch between the different Magic Numbers quickly to stay alive.
We hope that players will be entertained by this game, and that they will challenge themselves to reach new high scores. Thank you all for your interest and hope you enjoy the game!

Made by Dranikoda,  koifish and Chumdiddle for the VR Game Jam 2020

Install instructions 

Installation:

  1. Quest
    1. Download the APK file.
    2. Using SideQuest, plug your Quest into your PC, and click the install APK button at the top. Wait for installation to complete. The game will be located in Apps > All Apps > Unknown Sources (dropdown in top right) > NumberNightmare
  1. Rift / Rift S
    1. Download the ZIP file.
    2. Unzip it to a memorable folder
    3. Open the Oculus software.
    4. Open NumberNightmare.exe
